item.description:
Hey guys,
As promised, here's the posting for Shakespeare on the Commons. It's happening at the Parkman Bandstand at 8 p.m., but we'll plan to converge on the Common's side of the Boylston MBTA stop between 6 - 6:15 p.m.

Details on Shakespeare on the Commons: http://www.citicenter...

Details on the Boylston MBTA stop: http://www.mbta.com/s...

Bring blankets, comforters, bug spray, a sweatshirt, etc for the chill, and a picnic dinner and we'll set up camp on the lawn. Will provide info on whether rain cancels closer to Saturday, as well as send my cell # to any yes's and maybe's up for attending.

Will have spent the day at the Revere Beach Sandsculpting festival, so bear with me if I'm running late. This event will also be posted on the Beantown and Beyond Singles Meetup site.
item.how_to_find_us: Will be standing on the Commons side of the station
item.name: Shakespeare on the Commons
